title: MCP Natural Language Terminal Control
description: Expand MCP tools to enable natural language terminal control. Fix broken split direction in fugue_create_pane, and add new tools for creating windows, sessions, and listing them - enabling Claude to respond to commands like 'launch a new window' or 'split this pane horizontally'.
user_impact: Enables full natural language control of terminal multiplexer operations through Claude, completing the MCP integration story
